header-box.homeText: You can access the news and details from this page!
header-box.loginText: You've been away for a long time, we thought you'd never come back!
header-box.registerText: Register for free now and start new adventures!
header-box.recoveryText: Please fill out the form below so that I can help you as quickly as possible!
header-box.rulesText: Please read and review the rules in detail!
header-box.aboutsText: You can find details about us on this page!
header-box.privacyText: The details of the privacy policy are located below!
header-box.contactText: You can contact us using the following information!
header-box.bansText: You can see below the users who are banned from transactions on the site!
header-box.playerText: The details of the player named &username are found below!
header-box.chestText: You can manage your purchased products from this page!
header-box.cardGameText: You can play the game by pressing the play button immediately from the field below!
header-box.creditUploadText: You can purchase a &creditName using the form below!
header-box.creditSendText: You can send a loan to your friends immediately from the form below!
header-box.inventoryText: You can manage all gifts and rewards from your inventory!
header-box.giftCouponText: You can cash in existing gift vouchers here!
header-box.supportText: Your support requests are listed below!
header-box.supportCreateText: You can create a support request from the form below immediately!
header-box.supportIsText: The last action on this support request has been taken &LastUpdate!
header-box.pageText: You are currently viewing the page titled &title!
